title: Scalable Stellar Parameter Inference Using Python-based LASP: From CPU Optimization to GPU Acceleration
summary: To enhance the efficiency, scalability, and cross-survey applicability of stellar parameter inference in large spectroscopic datasets, we present a modular, parallelized Python framework with automated error estimation, built on the LAMOST Atmospheric Parameter Pipeline (LASP) originally implemented in IDL.
